title: You couldn't carry 4v5 so you must be punished -20 lp
body:
Isn't that funny? For example someone left the game in 10'th minute and you still lose lp. I don't deserve that -20 lp. It's not my fault that they leave.
If it's my fault, tell me what can i do 4v5 game?
Maybe an idea; you report a person for being afk and they being punished for it, game should give your lp back.

"Sorry for my bed england" :P

replies.body: These threads pop up every couple months.  If you can design a system that won't be abused or create even more toxicity and flaming when losing then I am all ears.
you also get +20 when you win 5v4 so stop crying

That's a good point also it's a gamble. Who can guarantee that you'll lose and get same amount of lp. I mean 4 times your team has afk, 2 times your enemy. That's not fair at all. Think about vice versa; you gain 2 times free lp. It also not fair.
